name: 2021 Demo Day Finalist: Deadbeat
description:
"Ahoy!

Some of my favorite games are: Omori ; Danganronpa ; Undertale ; Cytus 2 ; Your Turn To Die / Kimi ga shine!

I'm a huge fan of anime/manga :D. Some of my favorite anime are: Mob Psycho 100 ; Jujutsu Kaisen ; Haikyuu!! ; 3-gatsu no Lion. Some of my favorite manga are: Monster ; Mairimashita! Iruma-kun ; Dr. Stone.

I love to draw, and have recently switched over to digital art. I am currently practicing animating. I also fence competitively!"
